/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that flank it. Cars of various colors are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. Pedestrians can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a human element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is bathed in natural light, enhancing the colors and bringing the scene to life.
